```{r Cleaning, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
#Matrices will contain -1, 0, or 1
for (i in 1:38) {
  for (j in 1:38) {
    t2[i,j] <- if_else(t2[i,j] == 1, 1,
                       if_else(t2[i,j] == 2, 1,
                               if_else(t2[i,j] == 3, 1,
                                       if_else(t2[i,j] == 4, 0, #Neutral relationships = 0? 
                                               if_else(t2[i,j] == 5, -1, 0)))))
  }
}
```

```{r Matrices}
#Simulated Positive and Negative Tie Data 
pos <- matrix(0, 38, 38)
neg <- matrix(0, 38, 38)

for (i in 1:38) {
  for (j in 1:38) {
    pos[i,j] <- rbinom(1, 1, .08)
  }
}

for (i in 1:38) {
  for (j in 1:38) {
    neg[i,j] <- rbinom(1, 1, .02)*-1
  }
}

#Imposing Symetry
p <- t(pos)
pos <- pos + p

n <- t(neg)
neg <- neg + n
  
#The friendship Network (Square & Symetric MAtrix)
network <- pos + neg 
diag(network) = 0 

#Making a Signed Graph Object 
graph <- graph_from_adjacency_matrix(network, mode = "directed", weighted = T)

#Color Coding the Network Ties 
E(graph)$color <- if_else( E(graph)$weight > 0, "green3", "red3")
V(graph)$label <- NA
V(graph)$size <- igraph::degree(graph, v = V(graph), mode = "in")*2
#Initial Graph 
plot(graph, layout=layout_with_fr)

```
